name: Tyrgard Archer VR
description:
- Challenging bow play -

Easy to learn, extremely rewarding to master.

- A variety of enemies -

Do your best to hold back the tide of mythical creatures, all posing different challenges to overcome.

- Control the pace of the battle -

Need more of a challenge? Start the waves early for a high risk high reward play.

- Beautiful scenery -

Breath in the fresh air of the nordic valley, the calming sounds of the ocean and the seaguls. Enjoy the silence before the storm.

- Customize your playthrough -

Choose between powerful abilities as you progress, increasing your own lethality, but also that of your enemy.



Set in the idyllic viking village of Tyrgard, you are set to protect your people from an onslaught of vicious mythical creatures.

As a master archer, you unlock an array of unique skills and abilities, while advancing through waves of enemies.
But just as you, they too become more powerful as the battle progresses.

Get familiar with your bow and abilities to learn how to best prioritize threats.
The difficulty increases as you progress and you will encounter new types of enemies, who will challenge your mastery, reflex and awareness.
- You will not survive, so make it count.
